1336400.name: Heavy is the Hand that Holds the Six-Shooter
1336400.description:
Embark on an adventure in the Wild West after you wake up in a coffin with amnesia and set out to find out who you are and what happened to you.

  • Mouse driven controls
  • Real-time combat with one handed, two handed and thrown weapons.
  • Isometric viewport
  • Deep and emotional story
  • Engage in conversations with the inhabitants of the world and complete tasks for them
  • Survive by keeping an eye on your food and water levels and camp out for the night when necessary
  • Dynamic weather and day/night cycle
  • Non-linear gameplay in an open world
  • Care for your horse mount and your dog companion
  • Level up your character to increase your stats and unlock new skills
1336400.supported_languages:
英语*, 意大利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
